articles.author: Courtney Subramanian, Michael Collins
articles.title: Taliban's Afghanistan advance tests Biden's 'America is back' foreign policy promise - USA TODAY
articles.description: As the Taliban routs Afghan forces at a lightning speed, the U.S. retreat from the country raises questions about Biden's "America is back" foreign policy.
articles.content:
The Taliban's advance continued relentlessly on Friday with fighters capturing more provincial capitals including in Helmand, adding to the key prizes of Kandahar and Herat.

articles.title: Taliban take key city close to Kabul as US troops arrive to assist evacuations - CNA
articles.description:
KABUL: The Taliban pushed closer to Kabul on Saturday (Aug 14), capturing a key city near Afghanistan's capital as American troops flew in to help evacuate embassy personnel and other civilians.

Continuing a rapid advance, the insurgents took Pul-e-Alam, a…
articles.content:
United Nations Secretary-General Antonio Guterres warned that "Afghanistan is spinning out of control" and urged all parties to do more to protect civilians.
